title.native: 魔王学院の不適合者 ～史上最強の魔王の始祖、転生して子孫たちの学校へ通う～ Ⅱ
title.romaji: Maou Gakuin no Futekigousha: Shijou Saikyou no Maou no Shiso, Tensei shite Shison-tachi no Gakkou e Kayou II
title.english: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants

description:
As peace returns to the demon realm, Anos Voldigoad wishes nothing more than to put his reputation as the Demon King of Tyranny to rest and go back to being a misfit at the prestigious Demon King Academy. Unfortunately, any tranquility is fleeting: sinister demons, kings, and deities plot Anos's demise from the shadows.

Rumors spread about the "Child of God," a being whose power may rival that of Anos. To uncover the truth and eliminate the potential threat, Anos must journey deep into the land of spirits. However, the spirit world is shrouded in mystery, and it may only be entered after undergoing a series of difficult trials.

With unrivaled power and confidence, Anos braces himself to defeat various formidable enemies with grandiose titles. But he—with the assistance of his trusted allies—will barely have to break a sweat as the true Demon King of Tyranny.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)
synonyms: The Misfit of Demon King Academy II
The Misfit of Demon King Academy: History’s Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants Season 2
ใครว่าข้าไม่เหมาะเป็นจอมมาร: ต้นตระกูลจอมมารที่เเกร่งที่สุดในประวัติศาสตร์เกิดใหม่ไปเรียนที่โรงเรียนลูกหลาน ภาค 2

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大沼心) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shin_Oonuma)

After graduating from Chiyoda Institute of Technology he joined Office AO where he worked as an animator. He later joined Shaft in 2004 as a subcontractor, and he became [Akiyuki Shinbou's](https://anilist.co/staff/100089/) right hand until 2009. When he stopped working for Shaft, he found his new home at studio Silver Link, where he is to-date known as their most prominent director. Noted for directing shows such as [ef: A Tale of Melodies](https://anilist.co/anime/4789/), [Baka to Test](https://anilist.co/anime/6347/) and [Kokoro Connect](https://anilist.co/anime/11887/).

Oonuma is known to like so called moe games.
Keiji Inai is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with the music production company IMAGINE.
_Note: Not to be confused with [山口晃](https://anilist.co/staff/252822/Akira-Yamaguchi)._
